ISUR.MC.summary: Inmobiliaria del Sur, S.A. operates as a real estate company in Spain. It constructs and sells houses; offers offices and commercial premises; and rents car parks. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Seville, Spain.

QBT.MC.summary: Quabit Inmobiliaria, S.A., a real estate company, engages in the real estate development and land management businesses in Spain. It also manages residential and commercial properties, offices, warehouses, and hotels. The company is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.

RLIA.MC.summary: Realia Business, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in property, and development and land businesses in Spain and internationally. It leases and manages office buildings and shopping centers; develops and sells real estate properties primarily homes; and provides land management. It has a land portfolio of 5,752,433 gross square meters and 1,619,033 square meters of buildable land. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.

UBS.MC.summary: Urbas Grupo Financiero, S.A. engages in the real estate business in Spain. It develops and sells properties; manages and sells land; and leases properties. The company was formerly known as Urbas Guadahermosa SA. and changed its name to Urbas Grupo Financiero, S.A. in September 2011. Urbas Grupo Financiero, S.A. was founded in 1944 and is based in Guadalajara, Spain.
